extendedInfo.description: MilPay uses all the official data from the 2010 Military Pay and BAH charts and tables.   Please note this is for reference of 2010 pay tables - this does not include the current 2011 pay charts.  For 2011 data, please download 'MilPay 2011'.  No more searching through the DoD website for hard to read Word documents! This puts all your pay information right at your fingertips.1) basic pay2) housing allowances 3) breaks down annual, monthly, daily, hourly pay

reviews.comment: Great app for basic use... I noticed that there is also a retire app (not for android yet) could be be one in the same. Also BAS?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MISSING DATA
reviews.comment: Appears that all income   not considered in any category.   My totals omit disabilities,  Social security, both are posted on \"Accounts\" and could easily be included to reflect the accurate income. Other wise, great work. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not bad. Wish it had more features such as deployment pay selection. But does what it says it will.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be better. When will there be an update for the new pay scale?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What About basic allowance for substance (food) And all the other different pay
